USB-C TO DISPLAYPORT 4K ADAPTER: Connects dual DisplayPort 4K displays to the USB-C or Thunderbolt 3 port on your MacBook Pro or Windows laptop. Converts audio/video signals from sources supporting USB-C DisplayPort Alt Mode.
CRYSTAL-CLEAR 8K/4K VIDEO: Plays 8K video on one connected display for brilliant video. Plays 4K video on 2 displays simultaneously for multitasking and increasing productivity.
DISPLAYPORT SST AND MST MODE COMPATIBLE: DisplayPort Single-Stream Transport (SST) or Multi-Stream Transport (MST) can display the same image on both monitors, extend your host desktop, or combine both into one large display as a video wall.
NO ADDITIONAL SOFTWARE NEEDED: Plug-and-play operation with no software required for easy, immediate installation or external power.
